The CO2 emissions from
                        our day-to-day activities have a huge impact on the climate. This is a global problem, but you
                        can be a part of the solution.

                        CO2 emissions Calculator helps in calculating the taillight emissions from a conventional
                        vehicle as compared to an EV. It also calculates CO2 emissions abatement if a person switches
                        from a conventional Vehicle to an EV. Should I shift to
